name: A Noble Pursuit
description:
Website • Github • Itch.io

Description

Carolina, a young girl, dreams of becoming a merchant. However, her path is not easy, as she is a noble girl. Despite her standing in the society Carolina is determined to achieve her goal... but things may turn out for the worst.

Features
  • ~9.000 words
  • ~1.5 Hours of Playtime (Auto Mode)
  • 1 CG
  • Kinetic
Characters Developers

TheJayDuck - Writing, Editing, Character Art, CG Art

Avellox - Beta Reading, Proof Reading, Play Testing

crissNb - Play Testing

Additional Credits

Tools

5€ Art Pack Includes
  • [PSD / PNG] Character Files

    • In-Game Sprites With Expressions
  • [PSD / PNG] CG
  • [PSD / PNG] Thank You Sketch
